author: seungjin-yang
body:
#### PR description:
This PR is a ackport of #37954. This PR mainly simplifies the directory structure in the DQM output file and reduces redundant plots. Also, in the offline DQM, the way to build the initial state muon propagations and a matching metric is changed. You can find more details [here](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1161504/contributions/4878468/attachments/2444237/4188150/SYang_220515.pdf).
From a technical point of view, this PR adds base classes for online and offline efficiency monitors.

#### PR validation:
```bash
cmsrel CMSSW_12_4_0_pre3
cd CMSSW_12_4_0_pre3/src
git-cms-merge-topic GEM-DQM-Eff-Update_from-CMSSW_12_4_0_pre3
git-cms-addpkg DQM/Integration
cmsRun ${CMSSW_BASE}/src/DQM/Integration/python/clients/gem_dqm_sourceclient-live_cfg.py unitTest=True
```
You can find unit test output files [here](https://github.com/seungjin-yang/GEM-Workspace/tree/main/SW-Dev/220426_GEM-Offline-DQM-New-Naming-and-Modes/test/CMSSW_12_4_0_pre3/OnlineDQM-unitTest/upload).

- For the offline DQM,
```bash
cmsrel CMSSW_12_4_0_pre3
cd CMSSW_12_4_0_pre3/src
git-cms-merge-topic GEM-DQM-Eff-Update_from-CMSSW_12_4_0_pre3
runTheMatrix.py -w upgrade -l 11611.0
```
You can find the results [here](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1161504/contributions/4878468/attachments/2444237/4188150/SYang_220515.pdf).

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:
Backport of #37954. This PR is required to be backported into 12_4_X for the stable collision runs June 15.
title: GEM Online & Offline Efficiency Update (backport of #37954, 12_4_X)
